title: PRIMES Kick-off meeting
html: The kick-off meeting took place at the University of Glasgow in Glasgow,Scotland. The meeting was very well organized consisting of both presentations and discussions in between. Each presentation gave a better understanding of the project to all the partners. In turn, the discussions were highly interactive, which led to every partner expressing their views and any concerns.
summary: The kick-off meeting took place on the 7th of November 2016 at the University of Glasgow, Scotland.

title: Website Launched!
html: We are pleased to announce the launch of the PRIMES official website.
summary: We are pleased to announce the launch of the PRIMES official website.
